comments.body: It could make sense to make the parameter optional instead of the `| null`.

Well, looking at the implementation, the type could actually be `any` since anything other than a `Date` would clear the minimum date. But I think using `null` in the type makes it more explicit what the methods do.

Yeah, that's why I went ahead and went with `null`. Making it optional seemed cleaner at first, but then the usage seemed very awkward and unclear.

Thanks for the quick review!
